alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 10 at 5:26PM CDT until May 13 at 4:14PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CAMERON AND SOUTHWESTERN CALCASIEU PARISHES...EAST CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bridge City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Port Arthur, Orange, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Bridge City, West Orange, Pinehurst, Orangefield and Hackberry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
